name: 5-Star RUSH
description:
5-Star RUSH

Made for the 20 second game jam. Recommend fullscreen.

Try to earn as many points as you can.

    5 points    6 points    7 points    8 points

You can also earn bonus points by completing a bonus set. Eat the fruits in order to gain the bonus. You will also get an additional teleport ability when you complete a bonus set.

Controls

Arrow Keys / WASD -- move

LMB / Spacebar -- Eat

RMB -- Teleport

You must be facing the food in order to eat it. You can only teleport on a valid tile.

Original pixel art upscaled using https://irokaru.github.io/pixel-scaler/
